titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Vincent Godfrey Burns Papers

repository.corpname: Columbia University.Rare Book and Manuscript Library,

did.abstract: This collection contains correspondence, manuscripts, clippings, and printed material relating to Vincent Godfrey Burns, poet.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Poet, author, lecturer. Vincent Godfrey Burns (1893-1979) served as Poet Laureate of Maryland from 1962 until his death in 1979.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, manuscripts, clippings, and printed material.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p:
This collection is arranged in one series:
Series I: Vincent Godfrey Burns Papers, 1937-1969

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This collection is located off-site. You will need to request this material at least twenty-four (24) hours in advance to use the collection in the Rare Book and Manuscript Library reading room.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of specific item; Date (if known); Vincent Godfrey Burns Papers; Box and Folder; Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Columbia University Library.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Single photocopies may be made for research purposes. The RBML maintains ownership of the physical material only. Copyright remains with the creator and his/her heirs. The responsibility to secure copyright permission rests with the patron.

did.unittitle: Series I: Vincent Godfrey Burns Papers
Correspondence, manuscripts, clippings, and printed material
